=REQUIREMENTS ANALYSIS=

==1. General description==

   The application shall be a social web application to create an environment, where CMPE community can express and discover matters of interest – academic or otherwise.

   This place shall evolve into an archive of useful information. 

==2. Specific requirements==

===2.1. FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS===

*   2.1.1. Member profiles*

   2.1.1.1. Each member shall have their information fields such as: Name, Title(student, instructor, graduate…), Birthday _(optional)_, E-mail, Telephone_(optional)_, Gender_(optional)_, Interests, Connections, Education, Work_(optional)_, Graduation Year etc.

*   2.1.2. Home page*

   2.1.2.1. The user shall go to the home page after logging in.

   2.1.2.2. Latest discussions, current events, new posts to various interests should appear on the home page.

   2.1.2.3. The posts to interests that appear on the home page should be the ones followed by the specific user.

   2.1.2.4. There should be a vertical section where there are tabs such as inbox, connections, notifications, events, discussions, surveys, interests.


*   2.1.3. Creation of a space for special interests*
	2.1.3.1. Each member profile shall include a space for special interests specific to that person.

	2.1.3.2. Each member shall be able to create a special interest page by specifying its name, related categories by pre-defined category tags and related search tags of his/her choice.

	2.1.3.3. Each member should be able to decide the level of publicity of his/her special interests information(i.e. his/her information can be viewed either by all people or by a specific group of people like followers).


*   2.1.4. Discussion forum*

   2.1.4.1. A member should be able to start a new discussion topic.

        2.1.4.1.1. The member shall write a related topic about his/her post.

        2.1.4.1.2. The member shall choose the related interests to specify the target audience.

        2.1.4.1.3. The member shall post the content.

   2.1.4.2. A member should be able to reply.

*   2.1.5. Surveys*

   2.1.5.1. A member should be able to create a survey.

     2.1.5.1.1. The member shall choose the related interests to specify the target audience.

     2.1.5.1.2.  The member shall specify the duration of the survey.

   2.1.5.2. The owner of the survey should specify whether and when the results of the survey are visible.

*   2.1.6. Subscription to areas of interests and forums*

   2.1.6.1. A member shall be able to subscribe to areas of interests.

   2.1.6.2. A member shall be able to subscribe to the topics in forums.

*   2.1.7. Search/Advanced search*

   2.1.7.1. A member shall search for a person, survey, interest, discussion topic.

  _ 2.1.7.2. A member shall filter the result of search by using advanced search.

*   2.1.8. Browsing*

   2.1.8.1. Users should be able to view the website's homepage.

   2.1.8.2. Users should be able to view the forums, surveys and discussions.

   2.1.8.3. Users should be able to view the other members' profiles if allowed.

   2.1.8.4. The system shall redirect the users when a link of a different website is clicked by them.

*   2.1.9. Notification from subscriptions*
   
   2.1.9.1. There will be a page for each user where he/she will be able to check his notification list. 

   2.1.9.2. The user will be able to see the number of unread notifications on his/her home page.

   2.1.9.3. A member shall get the notifications for the newest posts about his/her subscribed interests.

  2.1.9.4. A member shall get the notifications for the newest comments about the topics he/she created.

  2.1.9.5. A member shall get the notifications for the result of the surveys he/she created.

*   2.1.10. Events*

  2.1.10.1. A member should be able to create an event.
	
  2.1.10.2. The creator of the event shall decide the information about the event like time,place,duration,other details.
	
  2.1.10.3. The creator of the event  shall decide the privacy level of the event like whether it will be secret or public and whether it will be invite-only or every guest will be able to invite other members. 

  2.1.10.4. The members of the event should be able to write on the event page,add links,upload photos or videos.

*   2.1.11. Settings*

  2.1.11.1. There shall be account and privacy settings sections.

*   2.1.12. Help*

  2.1.12.1. There should be a documentation about how to use the application.

*   2.1.13 Registration process

  2.1.13.1 The guest user shall register the system with username, password, and email address.

  2.1.13.2 The length of the username shall be 20 characters at maximum.

  2.1.13.3 The length of the password shall be between 6-12 characters.



===2.2 NON-FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS===

*   2.2.1. Operating & Platform constraints* 

  2.2.1.1. The application should be supported by Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox.

*   2.2.2. Modifiability *

  2.2.2.1. The system should be designed so that the developers can modify it to respond the varying needs of users.

*   2.2.3. Portability*

  2.2.3.1. A mobile application to interact with community shall be supported.

*   2.2.4. Security *

  2.2.4.1. The application shall be accessed via a user authentification process. (i.e. sign in) Only members shall see the contents. Registration shall be validated since it is a restricted community.

*   2.2.5. Usability *

  2.2.5.1. The user interface of the application should be similar to popular social media applications (e.g. Facebook) at the launch stage to achieve ease of use.

*   2.2.6. Privacy*

  2.2.6.1. The user shall be able to arrange the visibility of their information, posts etc.

*   2.2.7. Language*

  2.2.7.1. In the early stage, the application shall be in English for everybody including foreigners to understand.

*   2.2.8. Response Time *

  2.2.8.1. Response time of the wep pages and database queries should be less than five seconds with an average quality Internet connection.

*   2.2.9. Reliability *

  2.2.9.1. All the records and database shall be copied for possible failures and the copied data should be updated periodically(daily or after some amount of changes).

*   2.2.11. Expected Activity *

  2.2.11.1. Since the CmpE community is limited in number, user transaction per second will have an upper bound of the number of the people in the department, assuming a user can make one transaction per second.

*   2.2.12. System Availablity *

  2.2.12.1. The user interface of the system shall be supported by Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome.

  2.2.12.2. The user interface of the system shall be available during day and the maintanance shall be performed in the nights.

*   2.2.13. Physical Requirements *

  2.2.13.1. System shall be written using an IDE in Windows or Linux operating systems.

  2.2.13.2. System shall be written by using Java and MySql programming languages.
